tool.name: IHACRES Calibration (2)
tool.description: Calibration Tool for the Model IHACRES <br/> <br/> <br/>Reference: <br/> <br/>Jakeman, A.J. / Hornberger, G.M. (1993). <br/>How Much Complexity Is Warranted in a Rainfall-Runoff Model? <br/>Water Resources Research, (29), NO. 8 (2637-2649) <br/> <br/>Croke, B. F. W., W. S. Merritt, et al. (2004).<br/>A dynamic model for predicting hydrologic response to land cover changes in gauged and ungauged catchments. <br/>Journal Of Hydrology 291(1-2): 115-131.

param.name: DATE_Field
param.label: Date Column
param.help: Select the column containing the Date

param.name: DISCHARGE_Field
param.label: Streamflow Column
param.help: Select the Column containing Discharge Values

param.name: PCP_Field
param.label: Precipitation Column
param.help: Select the Column containing precipitation Values

param.name: TMP_Field
param.label: Temperature Column
param.help: Select the Column containing Temperature Values

param.name: INFLOW_Field
param.label: Subbasin Inflow
param.help: Select the column containing inflow data to the subbasin

param.name: bUPSTREAM
param.label: Is the subbasin upstream (no external inflow)
param.help: If checked, it means there is no external inflow to the subbasin

param.name: USE_TMP
param.label: Using temperature data?
param.help: If checked, then temperature data are used.

param.name: AREA
param.label: Area of the Watershed in [km2]
param.help: Area of the Watershed in [km2] used for unit conversion

param.name: SNOW_TOOL
param.label: Snow Tool on/off
param.help: If checked the snow module is active
